title: New: Yumi Zouma – A Long Walk Home For Parted Lovers
content:
Despite it’s acclaim, the debut Rhye LP, Woman, brought with it a surprisingly small number of impersonators.

Now, I’m not saying Yumi Zouma is in anyway a direct impersonation of the LA band. However her debut track, A Long Walk Home For Parted Lovers, seems to take a tasteful amount of the band’s pallet, running with the ‘hollowed out 80’s funk aesthetic’ in a understatedly delightful direction. We’ll be watching about for more.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
